<a id="class_MeshTexture"></a>

# MeshTexture

**Inherits:** [Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **<** [Texture](class_texture.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Simple texture that uses a mesh to draw itself.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Simple texture that uses a mesh to draw itself. It's limited because flags can't be changed and region drawing is not supported.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_MeshTexture_property_base_texture"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **base_texture** [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshTexture_property_base_texture)

- `void` **set_base_texture**\ (\ value\: [Texture2D](class_texture2d.md)\ )
- [Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **get_base_texture**\ (\ )

Sets the base texture that the Mesh will use to draw.

<a id="class_MeshTexture_property_mesh"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Mesh](class_mesh.md) **mesh** [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshTexture_property_mesh)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_mesh**\ (\ value\: [Mesh](class_mesh.md)\ )
- [Mesh](class_mesh.md) **get_mesh**\ (\ )
